[`var kAudioUnitSubType_DLSSynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_dlssynth)A multitimbral instrument unit that can use sample banks in either DLS or SoundFont formats.[`var kAudioUnitSubType_MIDISynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_midisynth-3su2x)[`var kAudioUnitSubType_MIDISynth: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_midisynth-7sqwb)[`var kAudioUnitSubType_Sampler: UInt32`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiounitsubtype_sampler-9nhfl)A monotimbral instrument unit that functions a sampler-synthesizer and supports full interactive editing of its state.
